input.sentences: we visited the fair and rode the ferris wheel .
it took us so high up in the air .
then we rode a side that spun us around so fast .
there was so many rides that spun us around .
after that we rode rides until it was dark outside .
output.sentences: Once again the fayre was in town
It was getting late, but that didn't mean it would be closing any time soon
As the night drew on, the rides lit up like candles
Everyone in the town decided an evening on the rides looked perfect
Nobody left until the sun came up the next day
